location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Leter no.212 of 1855 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Charles Augustus Murray, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: The letter is related to Kemballâ€™s explanation to the Court of Directors of Bombay (folios 20-21), of the impunity enjoyed by the slave traders on the Arab coast, in contrast to the success of measures against the slave trade into Persia. Kemball encloses with his letter (not included in the file) extracts of paragraphs 3 and 4 from his reply to the Government of Bombay, which he believes will be of interest to Murray.
